name: yql
description: YQL provides developers the ablity to access and shape data across the Internet using one language rather than learn multiple APIs.
author: davglass

examples.name: simple-yql
examples.description: Create a simple YQL Query to retrieve data from the Yahoo! Weather YQL table.

examples.name: yql-requery
examples.description: Use the Flickr Recent Photos YQL table to pull in a small set of recent Flickr images every 8 seconds.

examples.name: yql-oauth
